title: Signal Panel Series
description: Interactive expert panels dissecting X's algorithm, engagement strategies, and platform dynamics

introduction.lead: The Signal Panel Series brings together platform experts, growth strategists, and AI researchers to decode X's recommendation system through live discussions, case studies, and tactical workshops.
introduction.body: Each season features 8-12 sessions covering algorithmic updates, emerging tactics, and real-world optimization experiments. Panelists include verified creators with 100K+ followers, X engineering alumni, and GEO specialists.

items.title: Weekly Sessions (90 min)
items.details: Thursdays 2PM EST on X Spaces, with live Q&A and tactical breakdowns

items.title: Expert Panelists (3-5 per session)
items.details: Mix of creators, engineers, and analysts with proven X expertise

items.title: Case Study Deep Dives
items.details: Live analysis of viral posts, failed campaigns, and algorithmic anomalies

items.title: Tactical Workshops
items.details: Interactive exercises: signal audits, formation swaps, A/B test planning

sections.heading: Engagement Model
items: **Live Participation**: Submit questions via panel chat; top-voted questions addressed
**Async Recaps**: Session notes + key takeaways posted within 24 hours
**Tactical Templates**: Downloadable worksheets (e.g., Signal Audit Checklist)
**Community Experiments**: Panel-wide A/B tests with shared results

faq.question: Who should join the Signal Panel Series?
faq.answer: Creators, marketers, and analysts who want tactical X optimization strategies backed by algorithmic research. Ideal for those managing 10K+ follower accounts or brand campaigns.

faq.question: Are sessions recorded?
faq.answer: Yes. Pro/Premium subscribers get access to recordings + transcripts + tactical templates within 24 hours. Community tier can join live only.

faq.question: Can I become a panelist?
faq.answer: Submit your X profile + case study (via GEOCoLab contact form). We select panelists based on expertise, unique insights, and audience engagement.
